--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron walked infront of the large lake. He hovered over it for 
a few 
> minutes. Looking for the signal of his ship. He pressed a few key 
button and 
> the ship surfaced. Its name was the Colossus. It set down a few 
miles from 
> the water. Galvatron opened up the hull door and walked inside. He 
saw all 
> his comrade in stasis lock in the pods.
> 
> OOC: if anyone wants a pred char just make one of  the pods open up 
and make 
> a new char.
